title: Step Configuration
description: Configuration for a DELETE API endpoint to remove pets using path parameters.

title: DELETE API Step
description: Definition of a DELETE endpoint with path parameter for removing specific pets

title: Path Parameters
description: Using path parameters (:id) to identify which pet to delete

title: Handler
description: Handler that processes delete requests and removes the specified pet from the store.

title: Delete Operation
description: Remove the pet from storage and return appropriate response based on success or failure.
